subject: Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Attn: Beneficiary,
Scam Compensation Sum of US $ 11.5 Million dollars has been approved through the World Bank Mass Assisted Project Deposit Fund. This compensation payment was initiated to assist those who have failed prey to fraudulent business / communications in different categories, Inheritance, Contracts, Lottery, Romance Scam, Diplomatic
Payment, Fraudulent Loan Transactions, Unsuccessful Investment transactions, bitcoin fraud,property sale scam . Those who have also failed victim of BEC Scams also known as Wire transactions, Mass project assisted fund was approved to settle failed business / scam, you are qualified to receive this approved investment funds as long as you have received fraudulent proposal before, many people have suffered untold lost / hardship in the hands of those unscrupulous elements and evil-minded people operating all kinds of fraud / scam just to make a dirty living and misery out of innocent souls. you are entitled to receive this scam compensation funds as long as you have received a scam / fraudulent message through whichever way, also those that their business was affected by the Covid-19 pandemic.
In Addition: We have concluded our confidential  global investigation exercise which confirmed through our site light fraud monitoring radar that you were involved in a scam transaction with some group of fraud syndicates operating from different parts of the world by impersonating different existing and unexiting facilities. I presumed you may be wondering why you have not received any funds after obeying their instructions to send them money, sending unending fees to them without receiving one dollar cent, give this opportunity the benefit of doubt and see what happens next. How long will you continue to listen to them? Please wake up from your slumber or those people will wreck you without any benefit.
NB: You will receive further shocking clarification upon your response to this message. disregard whatever transaction you are doing with those scammers, better send us details of your transaction for a security check of authenticity through a security global verification data system, is better to confirm the authenticity of your transaction than to waste money which you shall regret in the end. This is the new global transaction reference code (HDYRT46/MBNTUT), Disregard any message from anywhere without this approved transaction code.
Yours Sincerely,
Micheal Bricks
Consultant agent (FIMS)
Global Financial Security Monitoring Unit
Phone: +44-7480-7294-01                                                            
Information: The phone number is also on whatsapp.

subject: Re:   Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Micheal Bricks,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. It's quite concerning to hear about the various scams and fraudulent activities that people have fallen victim to. I appreciate your efforts in assisting those who have been affected.

Could you please provide me with more details about how this approved investment fund works? I want to make sure I understand the process before proceeding further. Additionally, are there any specific criteria or requirements that need to be met in order to receive these funds?

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Attention: William,

Thanks for your reply. It's natural to feel sad when you are taken as a
fool by some fraud syndicates but it is also natural to be happy for a new
opportunity to bounce back from the damages of the past. kindly answer some
of the below questions.

1, did you meet any of those scammers in person

2, how much did you pay them in total, think if you can remember

3, did you travel to any country to meet with them

4, do you still have any of their contacts like Email, Phone, Name and
Address, although their details are fake but we need them if you still have
it available.

5, do you still have any evidence of payment sent to them

Finally, provide an answer to the above questions to enable access to your
file for a collective security review. I will advise you to maintain the
highest level of confidentiality if you really want to go through the legal
process of receiving Scam Compensation through assisted project funds.

Reply to this message as soon as possible.

Yours Sincerely,

Micheal Bricks
Consultant agent (FIMS)
Global Financial Security Monitoring Unit
Phone: +44-7480-7294-01

Information: The phone number is also on whatsapp.

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Michael Bricks,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your concern about being taken advantage of by fraud syndicates. It's unfortunate that there are people out there who try to deceive others.

To answer your questions, no, I have not met any scammers in person. As for the amount I paid them, I'm afraid I don't have an exact figure as it was spread out over multiple transactions. However, it was a significant sum of money. I did not travel to any country to meet with them either.

Regarding their contact details, I do not have any valid information as they provided me with fake names, addresses, and phone numbers. It's quite frustrating that they were so deceptive.

As for evidence of payment, unfortunately, I do not have any tangible proof as most of the transactions were done through unconventional means such as wire transfers and cryptocurrency.

I hope this information helps with your collective security review. If there's anything else you need from me or if you have any advice on how to proceed legally in recovering my funds, please let me know.

Thank you again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Attention  William

This is to acknowledge the receipt of your email and contents are well
noted. The point here is that your genuine transaction was compromised by
some group of syndicates operating a Bec transaction, known as email
compromise, however, you have been dealing with the same people but with
different email addresses with so many impersonated offices. A mass
assisted compensation fund does not fail as long as the system has Anti-
Scam protection certificate and the transaction server is registered with
all the relevant security agencies to monitor the process as the global
policy requires. I will provide you with the proceeding details and also I
will let you know how much you will pay for the compensation
non-interference fund protection code as soon as you receive your
compensation payment documents from the probate lawyer.

Finally, I have not come to deceive you but to add value in your life and
business as I have been mandated to process your compensation release. just
ask yourself why after all the fees you paid nothing was transferred into
your bank account, simply, you were dealing with crooks and there was no
money anywhere to give you. everything was fraudulently manipulated by
those idiots. you are not the only victim so many people have been duped by
those heartless fools who do not have conscience / human feelings. My
passport is attached for your perusal, fill this compensation biometrics
form and send back to us thank you

NB: I know you will be scared after what you suffered at the hands of those
wicked people, anyway, the process will convince you. please exonerate your
past from the present now that you have the chance to receive this approved
compensation. your name does not matter because it was through IMF
institutions profiling.

Sincerely,

Micheal Bricks
Consultant agent (FIMS)
Global Financial Security Monitoring Unit
Phone: +44-7480-7294-01

Information: The phone number is also on whatsapp.

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Michael Bricks,

Thank you for your email. I appreciate you reaching out to me and providing this information. It's quite concerning to hear about these syndicates operating in the email world. I'm glad that there are security measures in place to protect against scams.

I understand that you're here to help process my release, but I have a few questions before we proceed. Could you please explain more about the fund protection code? What is its purpose and how does it ensure the safety of my funds?

Also, you mentioned that I will receive payment documents from a probate lawyer. Could you provide more details about this lawyer and their role in the process?

Lastly, I noticed that you attached your passport for my perusal. While I appreciate your gesture, could you clarify why it's necessary for me to fill out a biometrics form? What information will be collected through this form?

Thank you again for your assistance. I look forward to receiving your response.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Attention William,

Thanks for your reply. It is necessary to fill the form because the
bio-metric form will be forwarded to the lawyer to initiate the legal
process before your file will be forwarded to the paying bank. Meanwhile,
please note that  every transaction is now being screened hence the lawyer
will handle all the legal process to avoid any difficulty in transferring
your compensation which was approved through mass assisted project fund. we
are proceeding by legal standards.

I will provide the lawyer's details once you fill and return the KYC
bio-metrics form today.


Sincerely,

Micheal Bricks
Consultant agent (FIMS)
Global Financial Security Monitoring Unit
Phone: +44-7480-7294-01

Information: The phone number is also on WhatsApp.

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Michael,

Thank you for your response. I understand that filling out the form is necessary for the legal process to proceed. Could you please provide me with more information about the lawyer who will be handling my file? What is their name and contact information?

Additionally, could you explain what the mass assisted project fund is and how it relates to my approved file? I want to make sure I have a clear understanding of the situation.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Attention William,

Thank you for your reply. Like I said, the name of the lawyer is
Founder/Managing Attorney of CORREA LAW in Chicago, i will forward your
details to him as soon as you fill and return the KYC form. Mass assisted
project funds are funds approved through the world bank to compensate scam
victims, are you clarified now?

fill and submit the form if you want to proceed .

Micheal Bricks
Consultant agent (FIMS)
Global Financial Security Monitoring Unit

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Michael,

Thank you for getting back to me. I appreciate your assistance in providing more information. I just want to make sure I understand correctly. So, the lawyer's name is the Founder Managing Attorney of CORREA LAW in Chicago, right? And once I fill and return the KYC form, you will forward my details to him?

Regarding the mass assisted project funds, could you please explain a bit more about how these funds are approved through the World Bank? I want to make sure I have a clear understanding of how this compensation works.

Also, what exactly is the purpose of the KYC form? Is it just for verification purposes?

Thank you again for your help.

Best wishes,
William
